name: Subalgebra.coe_prod
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
A : Type u_2
B : Type u_3
inst✝⁴ : CommSemiring R
inst✝³ : Semiring A
inst✝² : Algebra R A
inst✝¹ : Semiring B
inst✝ : Algebra R B
S : Subalgebra R A
S₁ : Subalgebra R B
⊢ Eq (↑(S.prod S₁)) (SProd.sprod ↑S ↑S₁)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem coe_prod : (prod S S₁ : Set (A × B)) = (S : Set A) ×ˢ (S₁ : Set B) :=
  rfl

name: Subalgebra.prod_toSubmodule
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
A : Type u_2
B : Type u_3
inst✝⁴ : CommSemiring R
inst✝³ : Semiring A
inst✝² : Algebra R A
inst✝¹ : Semiring B
inst✝ : Algebra R B
S : Subalgebra R A
S₁ : Subalgebra R B
⊢ Eq (Subalgebra.toSubmodule (S.prod S₁)) ((Subalgebra.toSubmodule S).prod (Subalgebra.toSubmodule S₁))
decl:
open Subalgebra in
theorem prod_toSubmodule : toSubmodule (S.prod S₁) = (toSubmodule S).prod (toSubmodule S₁) := rfl

name: Subalgebra.mem_prod
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
A : Type u_2
B : Type u_3
inst✝⁴ : CommSemiring R
inst✝³ : Semiring A
inst✝² : Algebra R A
inst✝¹ : Semiring B
inst✝ : Algebra R B
S : Subalgebra R A
S₁ : Subalgebra R B
x : Prod A B
⊢ Iff (Membership.mem (S.prod S₁) x) (And (Membership.mem S x.1) (Membership.mem S₁ x.2))
decl:
@[simp]
theorem mem_prod {S : Subalgebra R A} {S₁ : Subalgebra R B} {x : A × B} :
    x ∈ prod S S₁ ↔ x.1 ∈ S ∧ x.2 ∈ S₁ := Set.mem_prod

name: Subalgebra.prod_top
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
A : Type u_2
B : Type u_3
inst✝⁴ : CommSemiring R
inst✝³ : Semiring A
inst✝² : Algebra R A
inst✝¹ : Semiring B
inst✝ : Algebra R B
⊢ Eq (Top.top.prod Top.top) Top.top
decl:
@[simp]
theorem prod_top : (prod ⊤ ⊤ : Subalgebra R (A × B)) = ⊤ := by ext; simp

name: Subalgebra.prod_mono
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
A : Type u_2
B : Type u_3
inst✝⁴ : CommSemiring R
inst✝³ : Semiring A
inst✝² : Algebra R A
inst✝¹ : Semiring B
inst✝ : Algebra R B
S T : Subalgebra R A
S₁ T₁ : Subalgebra R B
a✝¹ : LE.le S T
a✝ : LE.le S₁ T₁
⊢ LE.le (S.prod S₁) (T.prod T₁)
decl:
theorem prod_mono {S T : Subalgebra R A} {S₁ T₁ : Subalgebra R B} :
    S ≤ T → S₁ ≤ T₁ → prod S S₁ ≤ prod T T₁ :=
  Set.prod_mono

name: Subalgebra.prod_inf_prod
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
A : Type u_2
B : Type u_3
inst✝⁴ : CommSemiring R
inst✝³ : Semiring A
inst✝² : Algebra R A
inst✝¹ : Semiring B
inst✝ : Algebra R B
S T : Subalgebra R A
S₁ T₁ : Subalgebra R B
⊢ Eq (Min.min (S.prod S₁) (T.prod T₁)) ((Min.min S T).prod (Min.min S₁ T₁))
decl:
@[simp]
theorem prod_inf_prod {S T : Subalgebra R A} {S₁ T₁ : Subalgebra R B} :
    S.prod S₁ ⊓ T.prod T₁ = (S ⊓ T).prod (S₁ ⊓ T₁) :=
  SetLike.coe_injective Set.prod_inter_prod
